meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jimmy Black Mark Kristal Susan Hodges Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1892.

td.p: Jimmy Black, an engineer from West Warwick, Rhode Island
Mark Kristal, a professor originally from Paterson, New Jersey
Susan Hodges, a writer from Palmyra, New Jersey

tr.td: NATURE
HOBBIES
NURSERY RHYMES
NOTABLE NAMES
ITALIAN MENU
FILE UNDER "W"
(Alex: Which means that each response will begin with that letter of the alphabet.)
